sql.if: and (CASE WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME > #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR H.ITEMNAME = 'SSP' THEN '0' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.ACTUALFINISHTIME > A.PLANFINISHTIME) OR (A.ACTUALFINISHTIME IS NULL AND #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# > A.PLANFINISHTIME) THEN '1' WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME < #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI < 1) THEN '2' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI >= 1) OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.PLANFINISHTIME >= A.ACTUALFINISHTIME) THEN '3' END) = #ONTIMESTATE#

mapper.select: SELECT OWNERGROUP, COUNT(OWNERGROUP) SUMOFPROJECT, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'INI' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) INITSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'RUN' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) RUNNINGSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'ICG' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) ALTERATIONSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'COP' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FINISHSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'OBS' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) OBSOLETESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'PUS' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PAUSESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'SSP' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PENDINGSTATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.OWNERGROUP, A.MD_ID MD_ID, A.MD_NAME MD_NAME, A.COMPLETIONRATE COMPLETIONRATE, A.PROJECTTYPE PROJECTTYPE, H.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUSNAME FROM $TABLENAME$ A INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE C ON A.GUID = C.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS D ON C.GUID = D.PROJECTROLEGUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = H.GUID WHERE 1=1 ) X GROUP BY OWNERGROUP

SELECT OWNERGROUP, COUNT(OWNERGROUP) SUMOFPROJECT, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'INI' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) INITSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'RUN' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) RUNNINGSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'ICG' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) ALTERATIONSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'COP' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FINISHSTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'OBS' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) OBSOLETESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'PUS' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PAUSESTATE, COUNT(CASE WHEN EXECUTESTATUSNAME = 'SSP' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) PENDINGSTATE FROM (SELECT A.OWNERGROUP, A.MD_ID MD_ID, A.MD_NAME MD_NAME, A.COMPLETIONRATE COMPLETIONRATE, A.PROJECTTYPE PROJECTTYPE, H.ITEMNAME EXECUTESTATUSNAME FROM $TABLENAME$ A LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = H.GUID WHERE 1=1 ) X GROUP BY OWNERGROUP
